Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42374 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.35.1-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-42374 affecting package busybox for versions less than 1.35.1-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package busybox is earlier than 1.35.1-1, affected by CVE-2021-42374
